question: There are 105 first-graders at Pine Valley School. 56 of them are girls. On Friday, 7 first-grade girls and 4 first-grade boys were absent. How many first grade boys were at Pine Valley School on Friday?
answer:
Of the 105 first graders, 56 are girls, so 105 students - 56 girls = <<105-56=49>>49 boys.
On Friday there were 49 boys - 4 absent = <<49-4=45>>45 boys.
#### 45
